summary: Castle Valdmire is a Vampire inspired, Adoption/Lore Friendly Player Home located beside Secundas Kiss or just S.West of the Western Watchtower, it includes plenty of Safe Storage, Armor Mannequins, Weapon Racks, Displays for Black Books, Masks, Elder Scrolls, Indoor Smithing, Plenty of room for Followers and much more..
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][color=#ffff00]I am currently no longer modding or supporting my original Skyrim mods..Check out my new/ported mods for Skyrim Special Edition[/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/6942439/?tb=mods&pUp=1] HERE [/url][color=#ffff00] or Fallout 4[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/users/6942439/?tb=mods&pUp=1]HERE..[/url][color=#ffff00]Thank you again for everyone's continuing support..[/color][/b][/size]

[b][color=red]This Mod Requires Dawnguard, Hearthfire & Dragonborn DLC's[/color][/b]

[b]Castle Valdmire is a Vampire inspired, Adoption/Lore Friendly Player Home located beside Secundas Kiss or just S.West of the Western Watchtower, it includes plenty of Safe Storage, Armor Mannequins, Weapon Racks, Displays for Black Books, Masks, Elder Scrolls, Indoor Smithing, Plenty of room for Followers and much more..[/b]

[b][color=red]This Home Is Compatible With:[/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249/?] Hearthfire Multiple Adoptions by TMPhoenix[/url][/b]
NOTE: To move your Children/Spouse into Castle Valdmire:
1. Download Hearthfire Multiple Adoptions by TMPhoenix
2. Enter Castle Valdmire and use the "Bless Home" Spell that comes from that mod
3. Talk to your Children/Spouse about moving into your "New Home"

[b]Plenty of Room for Followers With:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/?] UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul by Original - fLokii[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster[/url][/b]

[b][color=red]---------------------MAIN FEATURES------------------------[/color][/b]
[b]Navmeshed Indoor and Exteriors
Optimimized with Room Bounds and Portals
Lore/Follower Friendly
Compatible with Hearthfire Multiple Adoptions by TMPhoenix[/b]
New Quest that lets you Kill Lord Valdmire and take the key to the Castle (Read the note on the Main door to start quest)
[b]Valdmire Cavern containing Lord Valdmire and other leveled Ememy NPCs
New powerful sword carried by Lord Valdmire (modeled after Harkons)
New Auto Store and Access Feature for Containers and Workstations:
Auto Access/Store for Hearthfire Oven/Cooking Pot (Storage Barrel in the Kitchen)
Auto Access/Store for Alchemy Tables/Ingredients (Themed Ingredient Containers)
Auto Access/Store for Enchanting Tables/Soul Gems (Themed Soul Gem Containers)
Auto Access/Store for All Smithing Workstations (Barrel in Smithing Area)
NOTE: Storing a TON of stuff in the Auto Store/Access Containers may cause
the Workstations to pause or exit while loading/returning items
Castle Valdmire Teleport Tome (Found in Master Bedroom)
Change Your Characters Appearance (Mirror in Bath Area)
Enable/Disable Vampire Clutter (Button Switch in Master Bedroom)
Trophy Room with Secret Wardrove Entrance (Middle Wardrove in Master Bedroom)
Plumbed Sinks and Showers
Exterior Drop-Off Chest (Linked to Smithing Area)
NPCs undress when entering the Shower, Bathtub and Pool areas
Blacksmith Merchant
3 New Followers
New Horse NPC
Lightable Fireplaces
Lightable Exterior Campfire
Bedroom for Children (6 Beds)
Cage Vault Area
Alchemy Room with Hearthfire Style Planters, Themed Storage for Potions and Ingredients
Plenty of Room for Followers (22 Beds)
Kitchen Area with Oven and Cooking Pot
Themed Storage for Raw Meat, Vegetables, Fruits, Salt Pile, Wine, Mead and Misc. Cooking Supplies
Display Area for all 10 Dragon Claws & Right/Left Amethyst Claws
Display Area for all 14 Dragon Priest Masks
Display Area for all Daedric Artifacts
Display Area for all 7 Black Books
Display Area for all 3 Elder Scrolls
Display Area for all 5 Paragons
[b]Display Area for Bug Jars (Middle Shelf in Study Area)[/b]
Displays for Amulets (Nine Divines, Saarthal, Gauldur, Kynes Token (Master Bedroom)
81 Armor Mannequins
58 Shield Plaques
All Shrines of the Divines and Standing Stones (Shelves on the 2nd floor of the Main Hall Area)
Enchanting Table's w/ Themed Storage for Scrolls and Soul Gems
Staff Enchanter w/ Themed Storage for Heart Stones
Imbuing Chamber for making Spider Scrolls w/ Themed Storage for Albino Spider Pods, Safe for Gems
Alchemy Table's w/ Themed Storage for Ingredients and Potions
294 Weapon Racks
21.5 Bookshelves (946 Books)
42 Large Display Cases
6 Small Display Cases
Indoor Forge, Smelter, Sharpening Wheel, Chopping Block, Armor Workbench, Tanning Rack
Themed Storage for Notes/Journals, Spell Tomes, Unique/Rare Books (Master Bedroom)
Themed Storage for Armors, Gauntlets, Helmets, Boots, Shields
Themed Storage for Maces, Battle Axes, Swords, Greatswords, Bows, Crossbows
War Axes, Daggers, Warhammers, Arrows, Bolts
Themed Storage for Ingots, Ores, Leather Supplies, Dragon Bones/Scales and Misc[/b]

[center][b][color=dodgerblue]Special thanks to Just Call Me Frosty for the video review of Castle Valdmire..[/color][/b][/center]
[center][youtube]QZe2FnmPZjI[/youtube][/center]

[b][color=red]CTD, Low FPS (Related to Mannequins)[/color][/b]
Mannequins are heavy on memory, there's a few memory patch mods available that will help with loading related issues..
SKSE 1.7.1 (or higher): http://skse.silverlock.org/
SSME: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50305/?

[b][color=red]---------------------Change Log------------------------[/color][/b]
V1.4.1 Features:
Separated the Armory Section of the home into a separate cell
Prisoners in the jail now respawn
Cleaned with Tes5Edit

V1.4 Update 8/18
The Blacksmiths inventory should now respawn
Valdmire Blade is now able to be tempered at the Sharpening Wheel
Changes to the exterior around Valdmire Cavern entrance
All other changes from the previous V1.4 update have stayed the same..

V1.4 Features:
A New small Quest that lets you Kill Lord Valdmire and take the key to the Castle (Read the note on the Main door to start quest)
Valdmire Cavern area containing Lord Valdmire and other leveled Ememy NPCs (by the road and to the left if facing of the castle)
New powerful sword carried by Lord Valdmire (modeled after Harkons)
New Auto Store and Access Feature for Containers and Workstations:
Auto Access/Store for Hearthfire Oven/Cooking Pot (Storage Barrel in the Kitchen)
Auto Access/Store for Alchemy Tables/Ingredients (Themed Ingredient Containers)
Auto Access/Store for Enchanting Tables/Soul Gems (Themed Soul Gem Containers)
Auto Access/Store for All Smithing Workstations (Barrel in Smithing Area)
NOTE: Storing a TON of stuff in the Auto Store/Access Containers may cause
the Workstations to pause or exit while loading/returning items
Added more idle markers for children/staff
Remodeled the Hidden Armory Area
Other Minor Additions and Bug Fixes

V1.3 Features:
New Alchemy Room with Hearthfire Style Planters, Themed Storage for Ingredients and Potions (Off of the Pool Stairwell)
New Cage Vault Area (Off of the Pool Stairwell)
Spouse should now sleep in the bed (Special thanks to TMPhoenix for helping sort that out)
Displays for Bug Jars (Middle Shelf in the Study Area)
Added 3 Prisoners to the Jail Area
Fixed and Added a Display Message to the Enable/Disable Vampire Clutter Switch
Tweeked the Blacksmiths AI Package so he doesn't hog the forge
Changed the interior so you can fast travel from inside
Exterior Landscaping and Raised the Outer Walls
Added Various Clutter/Furniture

V1.2 Features:
Moved Enable/Disable Vampire Clutter Switch
Added a new Switch to Enable/Disable Staff from Vampire to Normal forms
New Exterior Garden Area
New Room off of the Torture Chamber for Staff + 2 beds for Followers
Blacksmith Merchant (Smithing Area)
3 New Folowers/ Guard
New Horse NPC
Exterior Drop-Off Chest linked to Smithing Area
Various Clutter

V1.1 Features:
Removed the floating tower above Bleakwind Basin
Changed the Interior Music
Changed the Map Marker Icon from a Settlement to Fort
Fixed the gap in the Bathroom Shower Alcove
Cleaned with Tes5Edit

[b]Recommended Mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57376/?]Multiple Floors Sandboxing by Dovahklon[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10652/?]Vanilla Mannequin Script Fix by SLuckyD[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249/?]Hearthfire multiple adoptions by TMPhoenix[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/?]UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul by Original - fLokii[/url][/b]

[color=red][b]Compatibility:[/b][/color][b]
This mods location is not compatible with:
Skystone Castle[/b]

files.name: Castle Valdmire - V1.1
files.changelogHtml:
Removed the floating tower above Bleakwind Basin
Changed the Interior Music
Changed the Map Marker Icon from a Settlement to Fort
Fixed the gap in the Bathroom Shower Alcove
Cleaned with Tes5Edit

files.changelogHtml:

New Exterior Garden Area
New Room off of the Torture Chamber for Staff + 2 beds for Followers
New Blacksmith Merchant (Smithing Area), 3 New Followers

files.changelogHtml:
New Alchemy Room with Hearthfire Style Planters, New Cage Vault Area
Fix for Spouse not sleeping in Bed, 3 New Prisoners to Jail Area
Fixed and Added a Display Message to the Enable/Disable Vampire Clutter Switch, Tweeked the Blacksmiths AI Package
Changed the interior so you can fast travel from inside, Exterior Landscaping and Raised the Outer Walls
Added Various Clutter/Furniture
